content: Hi @Yury Delendik, here's a public stream. I haven't taken a look at UnwindInfo and friends yet, but if there's anyone who you wanted to invite to join this conversation then now you can

@Jack would it make sense to have this stream be about Lightbeam in general, and discuss UnwindInfo as a topic within it? I'd assume that people interested in this topic might be interested in Lightbeam more generally, too
I renamed the stream, but please change it back if you disagree
